mapper.update: insert into AmazonSCDetailSalesAndTrafficReport ("ParentAsin", "ChildAsin", "Title", "Sessions", "SessionPercentage", "PageViews", "PageViewsPercentage", "BuyBoxPercentage", "UnitsOrdered", "UnitsOrderedB2B", "UnitSessionPercentage", "UnitSessionPercentageB2B", "OrderedProductSales", "OrderedProductSalesB2B", "TotalOrderItems", "TotalOrderItemsB2B", FromDate, ToDate, "InsertedAt") values (#{parentAsin}, #{childAsin}, #{title}, #{sessions}, #{sessionPercentage}, #{pageViews}, #{pageViewsPercentage}, #{buyBoxPercentage}, #{unitsOrdered}, #{unitsOrderedB2B}, #{unitSessionPercentage}, #{unitSessionPercentageB2B}, #{orderedProductSales}, #{orderedProductSalesB2B}, #{totalOrderItems}, #{totalOrderItemsB2B}, #{fromDate}, #{toDate},getdate())
